actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income the interest and dividends on deposits in savings institutions.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income up to $2,000 ($3,600 for joint returns) of the interest earned on savings accounts in banks, savings and loan associations, or credit unions.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income the interest and dividends on deposits in savings institutions.
